original_text: Ye mountains, that ye skipped like rams; and ye little hills, like lambs?
korean_text: 너희 산들아 숫양들 같이 뛰놀며 작은 산들아 어린 양들 같이 뛰놂은 어찌함인가

sentences.original_text: Ye mountains, that ye skipped like rams
and ye little hills, like lambs?
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희 작은 언덕들아, 어린 양 같았느냐?
